languages.text: Астропат, сообщивший Вольному Торговцу о неисправности, будет рад узнать, что священный механизм снова работает исправно.

traits.locale_text: Нужно рассказать шумному астропату, что усилиями Вольного Торговца священный механизм снова работает исправно.

languages.text: The Astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.
languages.original_text: Астропат, сообщивший Вольному Торговцу о неисправности, будет рад узнать, что священный механизм снова работает исправно.

traits.locale_text: The astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.
The astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.

The Astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.

languages.text: El Astrópata que informó de la avería a{mf|l|la} Comerciante Independiente se alegrará de saber que el mecanismo sagrado vuelve a estar operativo.
languages.original_text: The Astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.

traits.locale_text: El Astrópata que informó de la avería a{mf|l|la} Comerciante Independiente se alegrará de saber que el mecanismo sagrado vuelve a estar operativo.

languages.text: 自由開拓者に故障を報告した感応通信官は、神聖な機械が再びフル稼働したことを大喜びで歓迎するだろう。
languages.original_text: The Astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者に故障を報告した感応通信官は、神聖な機械が再びフル稼働したことを大喜びで歓迎するだろう。

languages.text: 向行商浪人报告故障的星语者一定会很开心，因为神圣的机器又能正常运行了。
languages.original_text: The Astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.

traits.locale_text: 向行商浪人报告故障的星语者一定会很开心，因为神圣的机器又能正常运行了。

languages.text: Der Astropath, der {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} die Fehlfunktion gemeldet hat, wird sich freuen zu hören, dass der heilige Mechanismus wieder voll betriebsbereit ist.
languages.original_text: The Astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.

traits.locale_text: Der Astropath, der {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} die Fehlfunktion gemeldet hat, wird sich freuen zu hören, dass der heilige Mechanismus wieder voll betriebsbereit ist.

languages.text: L'astropathe qui a signalé les problèmes {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} sera heureux d'apprendre que les mécanismes sacrés sont de nouveau pleinement opérationnels.
languages.original_text: The Astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.

traits.locale_text: L'astropathe qui a signalé les problèmes {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande} sera heureux d'apprendre que les mécanismes sacrés sont de nouveau pleinement opérationnels.

languages.text: Arızayı Hür Tacir'e ileten Astropat, kutsal mekanizmanın yeniden çalışır hâle geldiğini duyduğuna sevinecek.
languages.original_text: The Astropath who reported the malfunction to the Rogue Trader will welcome the news that the sacred mechanism is fully operational again.
